tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE mediation_sessions (
	mediation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	mediator_id INT,
	participant_name VARCHAR(50),
	start_datetime TIMESTAMP,
	end_datetime TIMESTAMP,
	location VARCHAR(100),
	description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE mediation_sessions (
    session_id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    start_datetime TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    end_datetime TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    mediator_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    participants  VARCHAR(255)[]
);

CREATE TABLE Clients (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(20),
  mediator_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (mediator_id) REFERENCES Mediators(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Appointments (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATETIME,
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME,
  client_id INT,
  mediator_id INT,
  status VARCHAR(20),
  FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES Clients(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (mediator_id) REFERENCES Mediators(id)
);

CREATE TABLE schedule (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE appointment (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  schedule_id UUID,
  client_id UUID,
  mediator_id UUID,
  appointment_date DATE,
  appointment_time TIME
)

CREATE TABLE client (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  phone VARCHAR(20),
  address TEXT,
  notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE mediator (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  phone VARCHAR(20),
  practice_area TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE calendar (
  schedule_id UUID,
  appointment_id UUID,
  event_date DATE,
  event_time TIME,
  event_description TEXT
)
